Best in its segment
Cloudtail India is the BEST
Power in pocket size
Amazing Phone.
Best ever experience of mobile phone
Happy to receive an Indian assembled Iphone <3
One of the best iPhone!!!
Product was good but amazon service was very bad
My headphone jack not working
review:
This is specially for i phone 6 users.....  
I was using i phone 6 and was literary fed up by slowness after ios 11
upgrade.  
I wanted to upgrade by my pocket dint allowed I phone X. Bought SE believe me
its a Beast.  
Good Camera, battery and its damn fast lot better than i phone 6.  
Highly recommended for people who can digest smaller screen size.

No comments needed. Best in its segment. Very much handy. Works as expected.  
Apple is apple. Keep in mind that the model is "assembled in India".  
  
packaging was not good. no bubble packaging nor any soft packet. The apple box
was just inside the amazon box.  
Anyway got it in good condition. charged on Saturday, today is Monday and it
is still showing 63% on 2G.

Nothing cons to say about the iPhone SE.  
Bought along with iPad 1017 from Cloudtail India.All PERFECT.  
  
For me Cloudtail India is the BEST Seller.. everything from clothing to
electronics I recieved from Cloudtail India are GENUINE.  
  
Thanks AMAZON and Cloudtail India.

I phone SE(32 GB):  
Battery backup amazing as compare to my old Redmi Note3. After moderate use of
day I still get 25% battery in evening  
Performance is far better than any 3GB or 4GB android phone.Never lags in
multitasking  
Camera: Quality of photos are some what good. Performance of 1.2 M Front
camera is great in day light . Never feel about lower pixel of front camera.  
Build quality is amazing . Compact and powerful device. Initially feel about
small size but later on you will not feel about it.  
Warranty and product is genuine and original .

Totally in love with the phone. Although i use it as my secondary phone which
means no social media and only work phone. i get an amazing 2 day battery back
up. Good phone and to my surprise it did not get obsolete with the launch of
iphone 8 and iphone X.

Best ever experience of mobile phone, this is my first iPhone which I could
get under my budget with updated technology and features, I found it lightning
fast, It runs without any lag even while operating multiple apps at a time.
Rear camera is unbeatable among the same range of mobiles available in market.
Person who is searching phone under the range of 15 to 20k budget should try
it once if screen size doesn't matter much.

I have receive an Indian assembled Iphone. Thank u amazon for that. Really
proud of it. No words after all it a master design in software & hardware.
When android offer 4-6 GB rams for smooth operations for the present time,
Iphone can provide better performance in 2 GB ram. There are more advantages
that can beat other android phones in same category.

First of all, this phone is assembled in India and not in China. Do not get
bothered about the hype of small size screen, which maybe the biggest concern
for whoever is purchasing this model, everything blends in nicely if you're
not expecting a 6s Plus size screen. This model comes with preloaded iOS 11.
Than there is this premium hands on feel of the product. Camera is nice,
Headphone jack is still available in this model. So far I have not found out
anything against the phone apart from a little 'faster than expected' battery
consumption.

Product was good but amazon service was very bad .... It was mentioned that NO
Cost EMI but interest is applied there.

My headphone jack not working plz help me Apple store.. I expected ur service

title: Beautiful!
Amaging

wanted to venture into the Apple world and this model seemed to be a good reason to not spend too much but get the ...

review:
This is my first apple Device, and I had my own speculations on how it would
be to make a switch from years of android. But this phone is such a beast
machine! Packs in that sucker punch for such a mild price tag.  
  
The iOS interface is smooth and flawless, adding so much flavour to the user
experience.  
  
I got this device for 18,000 INR and i am absolutely satisfied with the money
i spent on this beautiful phone

Fast delivery genuine product

Masterpiece. Amazing Amazon service.  
iPhone and Amazon extraordinary combination.  
I was android fan , this is my first I phone. After using for two days , find
this phone is way ahead of android and beyond comparison and highly secured.

It was once well said "If you don't have an iPhone, you don't have an iPhone".
The agreement to this comes from an hardcore Android Phone user too. The
switch is really worth while. Coming to the product. It's really zippy and
does really everything that an iPhone is capable of. Moreover I loved the 4
inch form factor that truly is the USP of the product. Really a great product
for first time iOS user.

Little beast is what I call it. I was using Nexus 6P Special Edition, however,
wanted to venture into the Apple world and this model seemed to be a good
reason to not spend too much but get the taste of the ios.  
This phone packs great features, read through reviews and watch YouTube videos
before you make your decision. This one is a fast feature packed phone.

Touch is not so responsive  
Finger print takes lot more time than an 7K android devices  
It is good but it is not best, worth for new iOS user not for existing iOS
user.  
Too secured, need password for all things.  
There is no choice of product return, in case of any damage you need to
contact apple center

Stopped working within 4 months..display gone..

The iPhone SE is absolutely amazing. It’s just as powerful as my iPhone 6s
which is totally worth it for the reasonable price that they are charging.
Amazon is also giving good offers on this phone. If you’re an iOS user looking
to upgrade from an iPhone 5, 5s or even a 6 for that matter, I would
definitely recommend this phone. Trust me. You won’t be disappointed.

Good in condition, delivered within time.  
About iphone SE: it is very comfortable for handling due to small size,
remaining all other features are as equal to 6S. If anybody compromise for
screem size it preferable with lo cost.

Tons of youtube videos are there about this product no need to worry about
that..... Only this is trustworthy seller u have to find then all comes to
place

using iphones since 2009 and bought this one for my wife. Good choice in
budget for anyone looking to dump their android devices. Was expecting a India
made device but got a China made but no complaints as of now.

Compact. Powerful. Has all the best features needed and pocket friendly.  
The battery backup os surprisingly great almost manages to stay for about a
day amd more with data, wifi, Bluetooth and gps on all the time

Great phone, very comfy to use, 32 gb is just about enough for my purposes -
ie - a no frills business phone. Got it for a great price thanks to amazon -
delivery on time, packaged well. I can reasonably foresee that this will solve
my phone problms for the next couple of years

Till date there is no alternative for the quality of iPhone outputs..even

drawbacks like u don't get extra space if need comes.. But tats all marketing
strategy.. As far as the product I received is as always top notch and is a

phone with good price and phone is really awesome in terms of
design,speed,packing.So I am truely happy and satisfied with apple and amazon
for providing best services to its customers.

Great device. Have to adjust to the small screen and touch of the small
buttons. Great camera and iPhone experience. If u can manage small screen it's
a beast. Original product. Great delivery by Amazon. It's better u go for 6s
it's the best. 6 is not good. U can go for a Android device if your budget is
low. Battery is great. Sound output excellent. Beautiful iOS experience

Love it!! Have no issues so far. Gotta be careful though dont drop it, which i
did once and the sound was feeble for awhile then it automagically fixed
itself.

iPhone SE is responding very fast with A9 chip. It feels very light and looks
elegant. iOS 11 is amazing and one can immediately feel pity over Android OS.
Once you are used to Siri, Facetime, iTunes or any typical Apple theme, it's
very hard to get away. Apple resellers like imagine, Croma etc. are charging
too much premium on iPhones. But thanks to Amazon and it's sellers we are
getting good deals. I am dazzled to see Designed by Apple in California
Assembled in India. So go ahead and buy if form factor is not an issue.

Great product from iPhone. Small in size but very powerful specially its
camera quality uncompareable.

Best deal made with apple. Small but powerful. Only drawbacks - single sim and
1.2 front MP camera. Rest everything top notch. Every thing can be done using
one hand.  
26000 was a bit too much already. Thanks to Amazon who reduced the price to
18000 which one can say is the best price for the phone.

Great product! At the price of 5s you get the features of 6s. The size is
great for people with small hands. It’s so fast than 5s and camera is better.

Its amazing as i was using 5s  
In independence sale i purchased it happy to got it in 18500  
Processor is very fast RAM is Double i.e 2 GB and no doubt about original or
duplicate since i have checked on apple website by entering serial number.its
origional  
Great service by amazon and rose gold colour is best colour  
If no one has issue of screensize thn its a best buy as 4 inch is sufficient
as it is easy to handle

Very very bad packaging from Amazon. Package was open.it seems someone tried
to find out what is inside the package..Though the phone box was sealed and
completely new.  
About iphone. No words....Just go for it... :) :)

review:
Initially thought that touch is not good. Android was more responsive and
faster. Thought of returning it. Planned to use it for 5 days as we have 10
days time to return. But now the fluidity makes me love it. Awesome screen
clarity. Even phones above 20k can’t afford this experience. iTunes is worth
subscribing as the music experience is amazing. Camera clarity greatest of all
phones in this range. Even better than 16mp phones. Apps and games are made
for this phone. Outstanding overall.

Nice deal .. got for 18k after Hdfc discount 2k... iPhone se power packed
beast with good battery life equal to iPhone plus models... iOS is butter
smooth...premium feel in hand... only one thing amazon delivery is horrible
took 1week for delivery....but package is good and genuine...feeling excited
to use this iPhone...

It is a mini beast!  
  
Good thing about the phone is doesn't heat up while watching a video. Haven't
tried much with the camera. It is a very handy phone for compact size phone
lovers.

This is always My right size of Gadget if it should be mobile for any
individual- Handy -within ones Palm hold & comfortable & convenient to handle
!  
I always wish & request Apple IPhone to continue to manufacture this size &
affordable to such individuals who Loke yo Own an IPhone

This is my first iPhone and really satisfied rather over satisfied. The
battery back up is superb. The battery stays more than 24 hrs even after using
the internet continuously. Thank you amazon for delivering such a excellent
phone. Highly recommended. Other features are also superb. Apple is Apple
after all. The name is only sufficient.

5 Star

Great buy, genuine product, very competitive price. Of course, you must keep

rather wait for the latest model.

Wonderful product,fast and crisp, unmatched quality.Those who talk long should

Besides,thanks Amazon for their super fast delivery.Actually the speed they

Mint condition. No issues with the phone so far. Very easy to use with a
single hand. That's the best feature of this phone. Very delicate so please
put screen guard AND case.  
  
Amazon prime members were not able to view this product. My husband, a prime
member, was shown only space grey for this lower price! People please check
from multiple accounts/browsers if you want to get the best offer.

Overall nice performance except small screen size.  
It took around a week to adjust with 4" screen as earlier using 5.5. But good

phone.

Iphone SE in 2018? Well thats the question came to my mind initially, i am a
loyal customer to apple products for quite a long time , have been using
iphones and ipads. Due to some budget issues i had to buy some thing cheaper
and it should be a iphone as i am used to apple music and cloud drive etc.,
this is super fast and super useful in 2018 with great battery backup, elegant
design, up to date OS, nice audio output, after all it is an Iphone right? So
if you want a cheaper Iphone with spects blindly go ahead gor this.

The battery of the phone has swollen with just a month and half of use.
Horrified to see the phone swelling at its joints. Returned to the Service
centre. Hope they replace the phone and ensure better quality.

All of us wants to have apple phone! I guess at 20000 price tag it is an
affordable i-phone. Features are good although not latest. However, it is more
than enough. Speed is really good. The exchange offer was also available,
which helped me to exchange my old phone as well however exchange rate was
quite low.  
Overall it is a good product at this price tag.

Sometimes touch doesn’t feel right on corners. Makes up for its small screen

review:
Awesome phone, even after used to 5 inch screens, this phone with 4inch screen
did not made me to regret my decision. Looks very stylish and compact.  
Using it for about 3weeks, Performance wise not even a single instance had
heating issue or apps hanging. Camera quality is damn good especially Live
Photos. Front cam is on par with 8mp cams of other brands. Music lovers will
fall in love with this phone instantly.

This is my first iPhone as I’ve been an android user till now and experience
has been great so far.  
I was apprehensive of buying this phone online but after 3 days of usage i can
say the it was a correct decision. Order is completely geniune and came nicely
packed. No issues so far. Updated to ios11 and it’s great. A good buy for 19k.
Anyone who loves small screen phone and wants to move to iPhone. This is it!

Good phone;  
no need at all to fit any accessories; I fitted tempered glass but I don't
think for a phone which costs Rs.26000/- can be protected with Rs.100/-
Tempered Glass!  
Also that "feeling of Apple" gets eliminated if you fit tempered glass!  
So I request not to fit it.....  
Enjoy the original Apple device...That's better.

Shifted back to 4" after two year. The best phones I had used recently iPhone
7 and google pixel. i found it most powerful mobile in 4" . I think anyone who
love perfect size of mobile should go for SE 32 or 64 gb. And silver colour is
amazing as always

I am not satisfied with the product because the phone has a problem. Whenever
someone makes a call to my phone, I am not able to hear clearly. The sound
quality is horrible!  
The speaker works fine,no problem with that but when I switch off the speaker
mode and hear it directly..The voice is not at all clear.  
Suggest me a method to improve and please help!

and camera performance are top notch.I'ev being using this mobile for a month
the battery life is consistently good i.e 16hr of mixed usage..The best part
about having this phone is the feeling of not having it as it's very light in

The selfie camera is a downside but not much of concern for me
